name: 2023 the 4th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence, Robotics and Control
content: Publication: The submitted papers will be peer reviewed by the international technical committee members and international reviewers. The accepted and registered papers will be published in AIRC 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be published and submitted to IEEE Xplore. Those papers will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main databases.
